14 Ioh[an] Bapti&slong;t
... ·19·
SEint Iohan wa&slong; þe be&slong;te bern &punctelev; þe holie bapti&slong;t
Þat euere of womman was ibo&rrot;e &punctelev; withoute ih&combcurl;u ihesu
c&combtildevert;&slong;t Crist
Ake of al þat he on vrþe wa&slong; &punctelev; we ne findez nouȝt iw&rrot;ite
Þat he ani Miracle miracle dude &punctelev; þat man miȝhte vnderȝite
Mani men þinchez þerof wonder &punctelev; &slong;o guod man a&slong;e he wa&slong;
Fo&rrot; manie miracle&slong; &slong;um oþur dude &punctelev; þat fulliche &slong;o holi man na&slong;
Ake al it wa&slong; fo&rrot; þe luþere giwes Giwes &punctelev; þo&rrot;uȝ o&rrot;e lou&combtildevert;de&slong; louerdes wille &slong;o
Fo&rrot; ȝif he hadde here on eo&rrot;þe &punctelev; ani miracle ido
Þo giwe&slong; Giwes wolden habbe iwent &punctelev; þat he o&rrot;e louerd were
Fo&rrot; he bigan fer&slong;t c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cristindom &punctelev; and þat folk þer to lere
Þarefo&rrot;e o&rrot;e louerd dude miracles &punctelev; and ne liet him do non
Fo&rrot; þe giwe&slong; Giwes &slong;cholden iwite &punctelev; ȝwuch he were echon
¶Seint Iohan fo&rrot; o&rrot;e louerde&slong; loue &punctelev; wa&slong; &slong;ethþe ib&rrot;ouȝt of dawe
Fo&rrot;to holden up c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cristindom &punctelev; and þe riȝhte lawe
Heroudes þat was þo king &punctelev; in a time to rome Rome
Wende to þe Aum&pbardes;our Aumperour &punctelev; a&slong;e is wone wa&slong; fo&rrot;to done
So þat bi þe weie he wende &punctelev; bi &slong;ire phelipe Phelipe his b&rrot;oþur
And maude gret fe&slong;te a&slong;e riȝt wa&slong; &punctelev; heo&rrot;e eiþur with oþur
So þat heroude&slong; Heroudes &slong;pac &punctelev; mid is b&rrot;oþer wiue
Þe[r. þat] he hire wolde to wiue habbe &punctelev; þe ȝwu&ydot;le he were aliue
And þat he wolde framward rome Rome &punctelev; þarefo&rrot;th aȝein wende
And nimen hire and leden hire fo&rrot;th with him &punctelev; and holde hire is liue&slong; ende
At on aco&rrot;d hu&ydot; weren &slong;one &punctelev; to don þis &slong;o&rrot;ie dede
A&slong;e twei &slong;ch&rrot;ewene aco&rrot;diet &slong;one &punctelev; to ane luþere rede
¶Þis k&ydot;ng heroudes&slong; Heroudes wende fo&rrot;th &punctelev; in is wei toward rome Rome
And þouȝte to take is b&rrot;oþer wijf &punctelev; ȝwane he aȝeinward come
His owene wijf it vnderȝat &punctelev; a&slong;e &slong;um freond hire wo&rrot;d &slong;ende
to hire fader þat
was king &punctelev; of Dama&slong;che &slong;one heo iwende
to beon þare fo&rrot;to heo wu&slong;te &punctelev; hou þis dede wolde an ende
·19· ... 19 33
Þe king heroude&slong; Heroudes bi is b&rrot;oþer &punctelev; Aȝeinward gan eft iwende
And al&slong;o it wa&slong; er bi&slong;peke &punctelev; þis wijf with him he nam
And heold hire with &slong;trencþe a&slong;e is owene &punctelev; in &slong;pou&slong;b&rrot;uche and ho&rrot;edam
And tiemde bi hire deolfolliche &punctelev; in &slong;unne and with gret wouȝ
his b&rrot;oþer and is wiues fader &punctelev; weren with him w&rrot;oþe inouȝ
And duden him harm bi al heo&rrot;e miȝhte &punctelev; and boþe weren is fon
Ake he heold him fa&slong;te in his folie &punctelev; and bilefde euere in on
¶So þat seint Seint
Iohan þe Bapti&slong;t &punctelev; to him a da&ydot; com
And calangede him of is &slong;unnne sunne &punctelev; to ligge &slong;o in ho&rrot;edom
And &slong;eide it was aȝein heo&rrot;e lawe &punctelev; and aȝein c&combtildevert;&slong;tindom Cristindom
Heroude&slong; þarefo&rrot;e in w&rrot;athþe &punctelev; s Seint eint Iohan wel fa&slong;te nam
And fo&rrot;to pa&ydot;e þe luþere ho&rrot;e &punctelev; in &slong;trong p&rrot;i&slong;un him ca&slong;te
Þareinne he la&ydot; al a ȝer &punctelev; iwarded &slong;trangue and fa&slong;te
And &slong;ethþe he liet &slong;mite of is heued &punctelev; a&slong; ȝe ihereth ofte telle
Als&slong; man redez in is da&ydot;e in he⁁rue&slong;t &punctelev; bifo&rrot;en eov in þe god&slong;pelle
¶In þe Ca&slong;tel of Arabie &punctelev; is heued wa&slong; of i&slong;mite
Þe luþere quene it binam hire douȝter &punctelev; and liet it fa&slong;te wite
his desciple&slong; wenden &slong;tilleliche &punctelev; þo&rrot;uȝ o&rrot;e louerde&slong; grace
And bureden þis holie bodi &punctelev; in a wel fair place
Bitwe Bitwene
Abel and El&ydot;see &punctelev; þat &pflour;phete&slong; prophetes ȝwilene were
Stille was is holie bodi &punctelev; wel longue ibured þere
¶Þis fal&slong;e quene þat heued wu&slong;te &punctelev; þat men ne founden it nouȝt
la&slong;te it were in ani time &punctelev; to þis bodie ib&rrot;ouȝt
And ari&slong;e fram deþe to liue &punctelev; and bicome at þe la&slong;te
A p&rrot;ophete ase he was er &punctelev; þerefo&rrot;e heo wu&slong;te it fa&slong;te
A da&ydot; a&slong;e heo biheold þat heued &punctelev; inwardliche in þe face
heo feol adoun ded anon &punctelev; a&slong; it was o&rrot;e louerde&slong; grace
Þulke wreche to hire cam &punctelev; þat deth hire adoun ca&slong;te
Me þinchez heo ne ouȝte nouȝt biliȝhe &punctelev; hire &slong;ch&rrot;euhede atþe la&slong;te
Ne þat luþere be&slong;t hire douȝter noþer &punctelev; fo&rrot; a&slong;e heo ȝeode a dai
And pleide upon .&ydot;se. in hire game &punctelev; ase mani a man it[r. i] sai
Þat ·&ydot;&slong;· tob&rrot;ak vnder hire &punctelev; and heo ad&rrot;onk anon
And in þe deueles name &punctelev; boþe flechs and bon
Þis hadde moder and eke Douȝter douȝter &punctelev; to heo&rrot;e Mede mede atþen ende
And al&slong;o &slong;chal ech luþur man &punctelev; ȝwanne vre louerd it wole him &slong;iende
¶Þat heued was &slong;ethþe wel p&rrot;iueliche &punctelev; to Ieru&slong;alem ib&rrot;ouȝt
And ibured &slong;tilleliche &punctelev; þat Men men ne founden it nouȝt
Of þis holi bodi þare it la&ydot; &punctelev; manie Miracles miracles come
Grete and faire n&ydot;ȝht and da&ydot; &punctelev; a&slong;e þat folk i&slong;aiȝ ilome
A luþer Aum&combtildevert;our Aumperour þere wa&slong; þo &punctelev; þe luþere Iulian
Þa Þat rene&ydot;ede o&rrot;e louerde&slong; lawe &punctelev; and was &slong;w&ydot;þe vuel Man man
Þo Men men tolden him of þis Miracles miracles &punctelev; In grete w&rrot;athþe and onde
he liet nimen þis holie bone&slong; &punctelev; and tosp&rrot;ede into al þe londe
And ca&slong;ten heom aboute ech fram oþur &punctelev; þat no man þareneiȝ ne come
Ne ne founden founde heom to fette is bote &punctelev; a&slong;e men duden er ilome
·19·
Ake ȝut fo&rrot; al is felonie &punctelev; ne bilefde o&rrot;e louerd nouȝt
Þat manie &slong;ike men þat comen þareneiȝ &punctelev; to hele weren ib&rrot;ouȝt
¶Þo wa&slong; þis luþere Iulian &punctelev; w&rrot;oþere þane he was er
A&slong;e is bone&slong; weren er to&slong;p&rrot;ad &punctelev; his men he &slong;ende þer
And liet heom fette aȝein wel clene &punctelev; and withoute þe toun anon
he liet heom &slong;ette on &slong;trongue fu&ydot;&rrot;e &punctelev; and furberne echon
And þut dou&slong;t þarof wel wide &punctelev; he liet blowe mid þe winde
Fo&rrot; men ne &slong;cholden of him on v&rrot;þe &punctelev; neuereft mo&rrot;e ifinde
¶Ake his o finguer with ȝwan he teiȝhte &punctelev; ⁁þo he o&rrot;e louerd þo he him i&slong;aiȝ
Cominde toward baptisingue &punctelev; ase at twelfte da&ydot;
Toward þe watere of Io&rrot;dan &punctelev; and loude gradde and cride and sede
lo here gode&slong; Godes lomb þat binimeth &punctelev; þe wo&rrot;ldes misdede
Fo&rrot;soþe no fu&ydot;&rrot; ne miȝte come &punctelev; on þat fingur one
Ake elles was al to dou&slong;te ibarnd &punctelev; bodi and bones echone
No fu&ydot;&rrot; ne miȝhte þat finguer b&rrot;enne &punctelev; fo&rrot; none cunne&slong; þingue
Fo&rrot; þe holie dede þat he þarewith &punctelev; teiȝhte to þe holie ⁁heiȝekingue
Ake he bilefde hol and ȝu&ydot;t is &punctelev; and þere ni&slong; non mo&rrot;e bileued
On v&rrot;þe of him bote þilke fingur &punctelev; and his holie heued
Fo&rrot; al is bodi wa&slong; fo&rrot;barnd &punctelev; bote vnneþe þulke two
his da&ydot; a&slong;e falleth in herue&slong;t &punctelev; þis dede wa&slong; ido
¶Þat is bodi wa&slong; þu&slong; ibarnd &punctelev; and al&slong;o þulke da&ydot;
Þeraftur longue men founden i&slong; heued &punctelev; vnder v&rrot;þe a&slong;e it la&ydot;
Of þulke two þingue&slong; men holdeth is fe&slong;te &punctelev; þanne þat ȝe it wite
Fo&rrot; men ne mowen nouȝt on o&rrot;e leuedi da&ydot; &punctelev; þo is heued was of i&slong;mite
A manere m&rabar;t&ydot;rdom martyrdom it was &punctelev; is bone&slong; &slong;o tod&rrot;awe
Þarefo&rrot;e men mouwe þanne holde &punctelev; is fe&slong;te bi riȝte lawe
¶His holie heued þat þus wa&slong; &punctelev; at Ieru&slong;alem ihud
Þo&rrot;uȝ fair miracle of seint Seint
Iohan &punctelev; fo&rrot;me&slong;t wa&slong; ikud
Fo&rrot; to tweie Monekus monekus at Ieru&slong;alem &punctelev; him&slong;ulf he cam bi niȝhte
And schewede heom ȝware is heued la&ydot; &punctelev; a&slong;e it were in a &slong;iȝhte
hu&ydot; wenden fo&rrot;th and &slong;ouȝten istt &slong;one &punctelev; and in þulke here iwounde
Þat he werede in wilderne&slong;&slong;e &punctelev; atþe la&slong;te hu&ydot; it founden
And þane f&ydot;ngur hu&ydot; founden al&slong;o &punctelev; þat wa&slong; of him bileued
With gret honour hu&ydot; beren fo&rrot;th &punctelev; þat fingur and þis hued heued
þͭ þat fyngerAddition is in a later hand.
¶Fo&rrot; fair relike hu&ydot; weren iwu&slong;t &punctelev; and ȝut atþe la&slong;te
Eft&slong;one hu&ydot; weren ȝu&ydot;t ihud &punctelev; and in a put ica&slong;te
And le&ydot;en þare longue ihudde &punctelev; a&slong;e fewe þarof þouȝte
Ake weren on v&rrot;þe al fo&rrot;ȝite &punctelev; as&slong; noman of heom ne rouȝte
Bote &slong;eint Seint
Iohan it nolde nouȝt &punctelev; þat hu&ydot; leiȝen to longue þere
To þe Abbod abbod
Maroel Marcel he cam a n&ydot;ȝht &punctelev; in met&ydot;ngue a&slong;e it were
And bad him nime is heued up &punctelev; and &slong;eide ȝware it la&ydot;
Þi&slong; guode man aros up &slong;one &punctelev; and ne abod nouȝt fo&rrot;to da&ydot;
Ake he openede is celle do&rrot;e &punctelev; and biheold aboute
Ane &slong;teo&rrot;re he fond bifo&rrot;e þe do&rrot;e &punctelev; houinde þarewithoute
Þe clere&slong;te &slong;teo&rrot;re þat miȝhte beo &punctelev; him wond&rrot;ede þarof inovȝ
.... ·19· ...
he þonkede god God with guode wille &punctelev; and toward þe &slong;teo&rrot;re he d&rrot;ovȝ
And putte fo&rrot;th is hond and wolde hire take &punctelev; ake he ne miȝhte hire nouȝt areche
Ake þe &slong;teo&rrot;re gan &slong;ofte to glide fo&rrot;th &punctelev; al&slong;o it were þene we&ydot; to teche
¶þis Abbod abbod hire &slong;iwede euere fo&rrot;th &punctelev; and þe &slong;teo&rrot;re bifo&rrot;e wel softe
Þe Abbot abbot
Anourede anourede his ledare &punctelev; fale &slong;iþes and ofte
Fo&rrot;th wende þe &slong;teo&rrot;re fo&rrot;to hu&ydot; comen &punctelev; ouer þat ilke place
Þare his holie heue heued la&ydot; &punctelev; þo&rrot;uȝ o&rrot;e louerdes grace
Þo heo cam ouer þulke place &punctelev; heo houede þare ane &slong;tounde
Fo&rrot;to Marcel þis holie Monek monek &punctelev; hadde þis heued ifounde
¶To þe guode bi&slong;chop Iulian &punctelev; Marcel tolde þis cas
Þo&rrot;uȝ heom boþe þat holie heued &punctelev; Inomen inomen up of þe v&rrot;þe was
his heued ȝut and is finguer al&slong;o &punctelev; boþe hu&ydot; beoth hole and &slong;ounde
A &slong;seint Seint
Iohane&slong; da&ydot; in herue&slong;t &punctelev; þus hu&ydot; weren ifounde
Þarefo&rrot;e ȝuit þo&rrot;uȝ he&slong;te of Rome &punctelev; &slong;o wijd &slong;o is cri&slong;tindom
Men holdez þane dai in ho&rrot;aunce honoraunce &punctelev; of is holi mart&ydot;&rrot;dom
¶Fo&rrot; in o&rrot;e leuedie da&ydot;e in le&ydot;nte &punctelev; a&slong; he wa&slong; to deþe ib&rrot;ouȝt
Fo&rrot; þe oþur fe&slong;tene þat þare beoth &punctelev; of him men ne redez nouȝt
Nouþe seint Seint
Iohan þat in þe fl&ydot;m Io&rrot;dan &punctelev; bapti&slong;ede gode&slong; Godes &slong;one
Lieue u&slong; þo&rrot;uȝ o&rrot;e cri&slong;tindom &punctelev; to þe Io&ydot;e ioye of heouene come
